snippet: Curt Schilling, the former Boston Red Sox pitcher, left baseball to start 38 Studios, a video game company, maker of Kingdoms of Amalur: Reckoning.
abstract: Curt Schilling, retired World Series champion pitcher with the Arizona Diamondbacks and the Boston Red Sox, runs 38 Studios, a video game company, maker of Kingdoms of Amalur: Reckoning, one of the most anticipated releases on 2012;
lead_paragraph: Curt Schilling, the former Boston Red Sox pitcher, left baseball to start 38 Studios, a video game company, maker of Kingdoms of Amalur: Reckoning.

headline.seo: Curt Schilling, Former Red Sox Pitcher, Makes Video Games
headline.main: Take This Mitt, and Pass Me the Broadsword
headline.print_headline: Take This Mitt, And Pass Me The Broadsword
